title: Countries with the highest rates of autism among children worldwide as of 2018
yAxis: Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied
summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in the y axis.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.
The highest Country United States has 158.8 more Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied than the lowest Country Portugal.
min_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied for 10 number of Countrys.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is appeared to be the highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in the y axis.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is highest at Country United States and lowest at Country Portugal.
The highest Country United States has 158.8 more Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied than the lowest Country Portugal.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Country in the x axis and Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in the y axis.
Country United States has the highest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied and Portugal has the lowest Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied.
Country Japan has the second highest value for Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied.
The highest Country United States has 158.8 more Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied than the lowest Country Portugal.
Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied at Country United States is 168.0 , second place is Japan at 161.0, and thirdly is Canada at 152.0.
Country United Kingdom, and Ireland share the same value 100.0.
The average Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied in all 10 Countrys is 90.22.
The Number of children with autism per 10,000 children studied is 902.2 if we add up values of all Countrys.
